page.title: 18PLACE NAMES AROUND CARLTON
page.content: The three villages in our block are {Carlton in Lindrick,Letwell }and {Wallingwells}Carlton's name in the original {Domesday book}is{Carletone. You can see how it has changed over the years to{Carlton.Letwell }and { {Wallingwells }are not in the {Domesday {Book} because the{Domesday Book}was written before Letwell or Wallingwell were built.A local story says that a man wrote{Lettewelle}on a stone when leaving the village.He might have meant{left-well.}Street names in Carlton are sometimes named after people and things from nature like{Hawthorn Way,Water Lane,Chestnut {Avenue and Beckett Avenue.}Sometimes they are names of cities or places such as{Doncaster Road,Rotherham {Baulk,Glamis Road}Glamis Road is named after a castle.{Windsor Road}is named after the Royal Family.
